# Efficient Spellcasting
## Overview
**Efficient Spellcasting**

You can complete long casting times faster than most wizards.

**Benefit:** You can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 round (such as the *summon monster* line of spells) with a standard action and a swift action.

**Source:** Ultimate Options: New Arcane Discoveries (Super Genius Games), pg. 3
